Source: Reuters

Description: The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq indexes opened higher on Thursday, rebounding from a two-day selloff over signs of prolonged inflation. A surprise deal between China and the United States, the world's two biggest greenhouse gas emitters, has boosted the COP26 U.N. climate summit.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3ksc5OH
